workflow.name: Run A/B-tested email campaigns using Gmail, Google Sheets, and Slack
workflow.description:
Run professional email campaigns with A/B testing, Google Sheets tracking, and Slack analytics.
FEATURES:

A/B testing with automatic 50/50 split
Email validation and deduplication
Batch processing with anti-spam delays
Professional HTML email templates
Complete campaign tracking and logging
Real-time Slack notifications

WORKFLOW:

Trigger campaign (manual, scheduled Monday 9AM, or webhook)
Read and validate contacts from Google Sheets
Assign A/B variants automatically
Send personalized HTML emails via Gmail
Log results and update contact status
Slack notifications on start/completion/errors

SETUP:

Create Google Sheet with 4 tabs:

Contacts: name, email, segment, sent, unsubscribed, sent_date, campaign, variant, error_msg
Campaigns: Campaign ID, Name, Start Date, Total Contacts, Valid, Invalid, Already Sent, Unsubscribed, Variant A, Variant B, Status, End Date, Duration
Send Log: Timestamp, Campaign ID, Email, Name, Variant, Subject, Status
Metrics: Campaign ID, Opens, Clicks, Unsubscribes


Replace YOUR_DOCUMENT_ID in all Sheets nodes
Connect Gmail credentials
Connect Slack (#marketing, #errors channels)

CUSTOMIZABLE:

Company name, colors, logo in Configure Campaign node
Email content and design in Prepare Email node
A/B test subjects
Batch size and delays

IDEAL FOR:
Newsletters, product launches, marketing campaigns, announcements, and any bulk email needs.

parameters.jsCode:
const data = $('Filter and Validate').first().json;
return data.validContacts.map(c => ({ json: c }));

const config = $('Configure Campaign').first().json; const contact = $input.item.json; // Variables to replace const variables = { '{{name}}': contact.name || 'User', '{{email}}': contact.email, '{{company}}': config.companyName, '{{date}}': new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US'), '{{campaignId}}': config.campaignId }; // Replace variables in subject let subject = contact.subject; for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(variables)) { subject = subject.replace(new RegExp(key.replace(/[{}]/g, '\\$&'), 'g'), value); } // EMAIL CONTENT - Customize here let content = `

Hi {{name}}!

We hope you're having a great day. We're reaching out from {{company}} to share our latest updates with you.

Highlights

  • New features available
  • Performance improvements
  • Exclusive content for you
Learn More

If you have any questions, just reply to this email. We're here to help!

Best regards,
The {{company}} Team

`; // Replace variables in content for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(variables)) { content = content.replace(new RegExp(key.replace(/[{}]/g, '\\$&'), 'g'), value); } // Complete HTML template const emailHtml = `
${config.logoUrl ? `` : ''}

${config.companyName}
${content}

You received this email because you're subscribed to our newsletter.

Unsubscribe | Preferences

${new Date().getFullYear()} ${config.companyName}. All rights reserved.
`.replace(/\{\{email\}\}/g, contact.email).replace(/\{\{campaignId\}\}/g, config.campaignId); return { json: { // Contact info rowNumber: contact.row_number, to: contact.email, name: contact.name, abVariant: contact.abVariant, // Email subject: subject, htmlContent: emailHtml, // Tracking campaignId: config.campaignId, sentAt: new Date().toISOString() } };

parameters.content:
## Send email campaigns with A/B testing using Gmail and Google Sheets

Email marketing with contact management, delivery tracking, and analytics.

### How it works

1. **Trigger** - Start manually, scheduled, or via webhook
2. **Load** - Reads contacts from Google Sheets
3. **Validate** - Filters invalid emails and duplicates
4. **Send** - Delivers in batches with anti-spam delay
5. **Track** - Logs successes and errors to Sheets
6. **Report** - Sends Slack summary with stats

### Setup steps

1. **Connect:** Gmail, Google Sheets, Slack
2. **Create Sheet:** Tabs for Contacts, Campaigns, Logs
3. **Update IDs:** Replace YOUR_DOCUMENT_ID
4. **Slack:** #marketing and #errors channels
5. **Test:** Run with test contacts first

## Campaign triggers

Manual, scheduled, or webhook.

## Campaign setup

Loads and validates contacts.

## Logging

Logs start to Sheets and Slack.

## Email delivery

Sends in batches with delays.

## Send tracking

Tracks results and handles delays.

## Campaign completion

Calculates stats and notifies team.

## Error handling

Alerts team on Slack.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.
